verses.verse: Or <S%G50>don't<s%> you <S%G80>know,<s%> brothers <S%G1063>(for<s%> I <S%G2980>speak<s%> to men who <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>), <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> has dominion <S%G2961>over<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G5550>long<s%> <S%G3745>as<s%> he <S%G2198>lives?<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G1135>woman<s%> that has a <S%G5220>husband<s%> is <S%G1210>bound<s%> by <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> while he <S%G2198>lives,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> she is <S%G2673>discharged<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G435>of<s%> the <S%G435>husband.<s%>

<S%G686>So<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G1437>if,<s%> <S%G2198>while<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G2198>lives,<s%> she is <S%G1096>joined<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> she would be <S%G5537>called<s%> an <S%G3428>adulteress.<s%> <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> the <S%G435>husband<s%> <S%G599>dies,<s%> she <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1658>free<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> so <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G846>she<s%> <S%G1511>is<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G3428>adulteress,<s%> though she is <S%G1096>joined<s%> <S%G435>to<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> <S%G435>man.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore,<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G5210>you<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> were made <S%G2289>dead<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> would be <S%G1096>joined<s%> to <S%G2087>another,<s%> to him who was <S%G1453>raised<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> we might bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> to <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G1510>were<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G3804>passions<s%> which <S%G3588>were<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1754>worked<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3196>members<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> bring forth <S%G2592>fruit<s%> to <S%G2288>death.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> we have been <S%G2673>discharged<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> having <S%G599>died<s%> to that <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> we were <S%G2722>held;<s%> so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2538>newness<s%> of the <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G3821>oldness<s%> of the <S%G1121>letter.<s%>

<S%G5101>What<s%> shall we <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G3767>then?<s%> Is the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3361>sin?<s%> May it never <S%G1096>be!<s%> <S%G235>However,<s%> I <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> <S%G1097>have<s%> <S%G1097>known<s%> <S%G1487>sin,<s%> <S%G3361>except<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3756>wouldn't<s%> <S%G1492>have<s%> <S%G1492>known<s%> <S%G1487>coveting,<s%> <S%G3361>unless<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> had <S%G3004>said,<s%> "You <S%G1937>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>finding<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G2716>produced<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me<s%> all kinds <S%G3956>of<s%> <S%G1939>coveting.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> is <S%G3498>dead.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> was <S%G2198>alive<s%> <S%G5565>apart<s%> from the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G4218>once,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G2064>when<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G2064>came,<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G326>revived,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>
<S%G2532>The<s%> <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> was <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2222>life,<s%> this <S%G3427>I<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> to be <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G2288>death;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2983>finding<s%> <S%G874>occasion<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment,<s%> <S%G1818>deceived<s%> <S%G3165>me,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>it<s%> killed <S%G615>me.<s%>

<S%G5620>Therefore<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> indeed is <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G40>holy,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G18>good.<s%>

<S%G1096>Did<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G3361>me?<s%> May it never <S%G1096>be!<s%> <S%G235>But<s%> <S%G266>sin,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> it might be <S%G5316>shown<s%> to be <S%G266>sin,<s%> by <S%G2716>working<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> to <S%G3427>me<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> that which is <S%G18>good;<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G1785>commandment<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> might <S%G1096>become<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5236>exceeding<s%> <S%G268>sinful.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4152>spiritual,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G4559>fleshly,<s%> <S%G4097>sold<s%> <S%G5259>under<s%> <S%G266>sin.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I am <S%G2716>doing.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2716>practice<s%> <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G235>do;<s%> but <S%G3739>what<s%> I <S%G3404>hate,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> I <S%G4160>do.<s%>

But <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G1161>what<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>desire,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G5124>I<s%> <S%G4160>do,<s%> I consent <S%G4852>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it is <S%G2570>good.<s%>

<S%G1161>So<s%> <S%G3570>now<s%> it is no <S%G3765>more<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3765>that<s%> <S%G2716>do<s%> <S%G846>it,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G3611>dwells<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> <S%G2076>is,<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> <S%G3611>dwells<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> good <S%G18>thing.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> is <S%G3873>present<s%> with <S%G3427>me,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2147>find<s%> it <S%G2716>doing<s%> that which is <S%G2570>good.<s%>

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G2309>desire,<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G4160>do;<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G2556>evil<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> I <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G2309>desire,<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%> I <S%G4238>practice.<s%>

I <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> the <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3754>that,<s%> <S%G2309>to<s%> <S%G1698>me,<s%> while <S%G1698>I<s%> <S%G2309>desire<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2570>good,<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%> is <S%G3873>present.<s%>
<S%G1063>For<s%> I <S%G4913>delight<s%> in <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> <S%G444>the<s%> <S%G2080>inward<s%> <S%G444>man,<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> I <S%G991>see<s%> a <S%G2087>different<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members,<s%> warring <S%G497>against<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> <S%G3563>of<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3563>mind,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G163>bringing<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> into <S%G163>captivity<s%> under the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> which <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3196>members.<s%>

What a <S%G5005>wretched<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> I <S%G1473>am!<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> will <S%G4506>deliver<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4983>body<s%> of <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G2288>death?<s%>

I <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord!<s%> <S%G686>So<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> with the <S%G3563>mind,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G846>myself<s%> <S%G1398>serve<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> with the <S%G4561>flesh,<s%> the <S%G266>sin<s%>'s <S%G3551>law.<s%>
